lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The creation of the commission is intended to underscore the Brazilian government's contention that the debt issue is essentially political and that a political solution must be found to the problem.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But the new commission has diplomats among its members and the chief negotiator, Saraiva Guerreiro, is a seasoned envoy with a long diplomatic career.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Funaro was due to hold talks in New York today with the private sector, before travelling to Washington for the semi- annual meeting of the International Monetary Fund and the World Bank.
